description: This course facilitates oral and written use of the language through conversation and composition, English to Russian translation, selections from Russian literature, and original themes. Prerequisite: Russian Language and Area Studies 232 or special permission of instructor. Offered annually in the fall semester.
name: Conversation & Comp
prerequisites: Russian Language and Area Studies 232 or special permission of instructor. Offered annually in the fall semester.
